EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to YETI! We would be more than happy to assist you. If you could provide us with a copy of your police report stating the type and size cooler that was stolen, we can offer you a 30% discount on the purchase of a replacement cooler. Please send the police report as a reply to this email and we will authorize your discounted order.
If you have any further questions, please feel free to reply to this email.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
